response.original_title: Edgar Allan Poe's Murder Mystery Dinner Party, also known as Edgar Allan Poe's Murder Mystery Invite Only Casual Dinner Party / Gala For Friends Potluck
response.overview: Edgar Allan Poe throws a murder mystery dinner party to impress the beautiful Annabel Lee. He invites some of the world's most renowned authors. Things go awry when someone actually gets murdered...
response.tagline: You are formally invited to join our dinner party--if you dare!
response.title: Edgar Allan Poe's Murder Mystery Dinner Party, also known as Edgar Allan Poe's Murder Mystery Invite Only Casual Dinner Party / Gala For Friends Potluck
